Agent20

www.agent20.com is a hotel booking website for sports teams. Team representatives can post their lodging needs and then hotels in the area can submit special offers for the representative to choose from.

Process

A test app for Agent20 had already been created and we were using

For the first phase, we created a store site for them. The goal was to design a user friendly store that complemented the Joomla site, but was also made in a way that it could be reused once the site was converted.
